title: "Aaron Boone Loses His Mind, Imitates Umpire Laz Diaz During Epic Ejection"
excerpt: "Those who are pushing for robot umpires should think long and hard about what the sport will lose. Irate managers looking to mock the calls will have to make some beep-bop-booping noises and move their arms all mechanically and it just won't have the same effect of channeling a human being's demonstrative strike three motion. And that will be sad."
